item.title: Need an YouTube Cash Cow Automation Expert Team for Celebrity Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Youtube Automation Expert to Manage and Grow our Youtube Channels from Ground Up in selected niches for our clients.

This a complete execution project, where you will be responsible to creating the complete videos on topics provided by us.

You should have experience or a team with  :

- Voice Over Artists
- Video Editors
- Thumbnail Designers
- Researchers and Script Writers

This is an long term opportunity and we will trust you with growth and scaling of the channel.

Please apply only if you have experience in Past.

Happy to Pay $40 Per video at start and scale to $65 per video going forward

Budget: $100

item.title: Social Media Ad Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a skilled video editor who specializes in creating engaging social media ads. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing short videos for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. The videos will be around 10-20 seconds in duration, so the editor must be able to create concise and attention-grabbing content. Attention to detail and a strong sense of storytelling are essential. The editor should be proficient in using video editing software and have a good understanding of current social media trends. If you have a creative eye and can deliver high-quality videos that drive user engagement, we would love to work with you.

Relevant skills:
- Video editing
- Social media ad creation
- Attention to detail
- Storytelling
- Video editing software proficiency
- Understanding of social media trends

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.title: Social Media Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Social Media Content Creator with expertise in Photoshop and Final Cut Pro. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating engaging and visually appealing stories for Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok. Content creation will follow specific guidelines tailored to each platform to ensure brand consistency and cohesiveness.

**Responsibilities:**
- Create compelling stories and content for Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok.
- Follow specific content guidelines for each platform.
- Edit and enhance videos using Final Cut Pro.
- Design graphics and visuals using Photoshop.
- Receive and manage content via Google Drive and downloads from YouTube.
- Study and adhere to brand guidelines to ensure all content aligns with the brand's voice and aesthetic.
- Work independently and creatively while meeting deadlines.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience with Photoshop and Final Cut Pro.
- Strong portfolio showcasing Instagram stories and other social media content.
- Ability to follow brand guidelines and ensure cohesive content across platforms.
- Creative mindset with the ability to work independently.
- Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.
- Prior experience with content creation for social media platforms.

**Trial Period:**
Before hiring full-time, candidates will undergo a paid trial period to assess their skills and compatibility with our brand.

**Application Process:**
To apply, please submit your portfolio including Instagram stories you have created in the past. Preferred formats are PNG or MOV.

**More Information:**
Additional details about our business and specific content guidelines will be provided to candidates whose experience aligns with our requirements.

We look forward to seeing your creative work and exploring the possibility of you joining our team!



Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:08 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content, Photo Editing Software, Video Editing Software, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Content, Photo Editing Software, Video Editing Software, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Movie critics youtube video - Upwork
item.description:
I have a Youtube channel in the filmmaking analysis niche

Your job will be finding clips and pictures from the movies, and edit them in the video.
each segment should be relevant to what the voiceover is saying in that moment, to keep everything engaging.

I don't need motion graphics or complicated things, I basically only need someone to trim sections from the movies (1080p, 60fps) and put them in the video as B roll, while maintaing somewhat the pacing of the voiceover.

Some parts of the video like the intro will already be edited by me, since I still want to be the one in charge of the more articulate things.

Some example of the editing I need.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JR3hzUtJKYA&t=1s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RmCWDZulUuQ&t=102s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oQzBHIhsszE&t=69s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aiJyq6H24Vc&t=23s

Please show some previous work relevant to this movie analysis type of videos

Price can be discussed, so feel free to dm.


Budget: $60
Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Film, Movie, Narrative Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Film, Movie, Narrative Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Creator and Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Youtube Video Creator and Editor to produce engaging and professional videos for promoting and explaining our company's services. As our Video Creator and Editor, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing and compelling videos that effectively communicate our brand messaging and drive engagement. You will work closely with our marketing team to understand the objectives of each video and bring them to life through creative storytelling and attention-grabbing visuals.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in YouTube analytics and SEO
    - Strong video editing and production skills
    - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
    - Strong understanding of video production techniques, including shooting and lighting
    - Ability to create visually appealing graphics and animations
    - Excellent storytelling and narrative skills
    - Knowledge of YouTube best practices and trends

    If you have a passion for video creation and are able to deliver high-quality videos that captivate audiences, we would love to hear from you.

    Please provide a portfolio or examples of your previous work for consideration.

    This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

    Expertise level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Commercial
Country: United States

item.title: Educational Video Content on CBD in 2 Languages - Upwork
item.description:
Hello All!

Grengo SV needs assistance in creating more than just AI generated CBD videos for the public of El Salvador. These educational vids need to include specific topics such as; "What is CBD", "How does CBD differ from THC", "Legality of THC and CBD in El Salvador" "what is zero THC mean?" etc.

This contract has potential to be ongoing- as we are building our team now. We need the video content to be available in two languages, English and Spanish. We need to have a Spanish speaker with English subtitles, as this format will work on all of our platforms- videos will be used to market our website on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, etc. Due to the nature of CBD, we cannot directly market on these sites. Therefore we need educational 45-60 second videos that markets our website while sharing information.

We require a sample of your work before we commit. Send us your price proposal for work with a sample of video content you have created (not AI generated, we're looking for authenticity). Looking forward to hearing from you. Please let me know if you have questions. visit us online at www.grengosv.com for more details about us! Please do not contact us via WhatsApp, use this site to share information only. Thank you.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:55 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Lifestyle, Fashion & Beauty, Business, English, Video Production, Content Writing, Video Editing, Castilian Spanish, SEO Writing
Skills: Lifestyle, Fashion & Beauty, Business, English, Video Production, Content Writing, Video Editing, Castilian Spanish, SEO Writing
Country: El Salvador
click to apply

item.title: Create High-Quality 15-Minute VSL - Video Sales Letter - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an awesome VSL creator to help us put together a video sales letter for our new product.

We have a script which we are currently recording, which is ~15 minutes in length (2900 words).

We are looking for a great, experienced VSL creator to take our script and graphics, and turn it into an ace VSL to try to sell our product.

Experienced VSL creators preferably. Please start your message with YOLO and include a sample of your best VSL, to help us make a decision. Feel free to include details of your typical pricing.

Thank you very much for your help and time!

item.title: UGC Style Video for B2B Service - Upwork
item.description:
GENERAL
We are seeking a talented individual to create a self-recorded, UGC-style video explaining how our B2B service has helped you hire virtual assistants and grow your business 10x more quickly than you would have otherwise.

PROJECT DETAILS
- Video Length: 15-20 seconds max
- Style: Authentic and sincere, not overly edited or polished
- Platform: The video should feel native to Instagram and Facebook
-  Create a self-recorded video
- Highlight 5-10 key points provided by us
- Develop a script that feels true and authentic to your voice

REQUIREMENTS
- Ability to produce high-quality, authentic self-recorded videos
- Familiarity with creating content for social media platforms like Instagram and Facebook
- Strong communication skills to convey the key points effectively

Budget: $100

item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for a video maker to create a brief tutorial video demonstrating how to use a streetwear mockups package. I have attached a sample video to give an idea of the format and style I am looking for.

Project Details:

- Video Length: Approximately 0.30-1.30 minutes max
- Content: The video should illustrate the main steps for using the mockups, highlighting the features and functionalities of the package.

What I Offer:

Opportunity for ongoing collaboration on similar future projects.

If you are interested, please send me your portfolio and a brief description of your experience. I am available for further details and clarifications.

item.title: Game trailer video editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to create captivating marketing assets for our game development partners. The editor will need to go into existing games and help capture footage, assist in storyboarding, then generate the final promotional assets.

The assets will be for promotional purposes including longer trailers for significant marketing beats, clips on channels like YouTube and TikTok to highlight gameplay, event showcases, and more.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video editing and/or videography. Passion for video games is a plus.

Required Skills:
- Proficient in video capture software (e.g. Premiere, Camtasia)
- Strong understanding of storytelling along with color grading, audio mixing, and other videography techniques

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Gaming Video, Footage-Based Video, Promotional Video, Trailer, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Gaming Video, Footage-Based Video, Promotional Video, Trailer, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: Remote Video Editor (Pakistan) - Upwork
item.description:
Position: Remote Video Editor
Location: Pakistan (Remote)
Salary: 100,000 PKR per month
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 10am to 6pm

Are you a talented video editor based in Pakistan with a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating professional video content? We are looking for a dedicated individual to join our team as a full-time remote Video Editor.

Key Responsibilities:
Produce high-quality video edits for various projects.
Collaborate with the creative team to meet project deadlines.
Ensure all video content aligns with our brand's standards.
Organize and manage multiple video projects concurrently.

Requirements:
Attention to Detail: Ability to spot and correct errors, ensuring seamless, polished video content.
Organised: Efficient in managing multiple tasks and deadlines.
Professional Skills: Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
Internet Speed: FAST connection is essential. Please include your internet speed stats in your application.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary of 100,000 PKR per month.
Flexible, remote working from the comfort of your home.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic and creative team.

IMPORTANT: Please include "VideoEdits2024" in the title or first line of your response. Applications without this will be automatically rejected.

Please also include examples of past work, and tell me how fast your upload/download speed is. Tell me why you want to apply for this job too.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Audition, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Skills: Adobe Audition, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Country: GBR
click to apply

item.description:
I am looking for someone to create informational videos for our IT services firm. We will provide the script, example videos, type of tone we are looking for.
Must be able to record quality videos with good lighting and background.
What is your favorite vacation spot?
Must speak clear and English. Accents are ok as long as your message is clear.

We are looking for someone who is comfortable being on camera.
Interested?
